data: Christopher Marrapit | Mrs. Major | Rose of Sharon
Mr. Christopher Marrapit is dozing in a chair upon the lawn; his darling cat, the Rose of Sharon, is sleeping on his lap; stiffly beside him sits Mrs. Major, his companionâ€”that masterly woman.
